titles.title: PART Act
PART Act
Preventing Auto Recycling Theft Act
To prevent the theft of catalytic converters and other precious metal car parts, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce, and in addition to the Committees on Transportation and Infrastructure, and the Judiciary, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
